mapper.select: SELECT d.baseDetailsId,d.otherDetailsId FROM patientcase c JOIN details d on c.detailsId = d.tableId where c.patientId = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into details ( tableId, caseId, baseDetailsId, otherDetailsId, criticalBloodPressureHeigh, criticalBloodPressureLow, criticalFastingBloodSuger, criticalPostprandialBloodSuger, criticalWeight, delFlag) values ( #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{basedetailsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherdetailsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{criticalBloodPressureHeigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{criticalBloodPressureLow,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{criticalFastingBloodSuger,jdbcType=DOUBLE}), #{criticalPostprandialBloodSuger,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{criticalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}), #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),

insert into details
tableId,
caseId,
baseDetailsId,
otherDetailsId,
criticalBloodPressureHeigh,
criticalBloodPressureLow,
criticalFastingBloodSuger,
criticalPostprandialBloodSuger,
criticalWeight,
delFlag,

mapper.update:
update details
caseId = #{caseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
baseDetailsId = #{basedetailsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
otherDetailsId = #{otherdetailsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
criticalBloodPressureHeigh = #{criticalBloodPressureHeigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
criticalBloodPressureLow = #{criticalBloodPressureLow,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
criticalFastingBloodSuger = #{criticalFastingBloodSuger,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
criticalPostprandialBloodSuger = #{criticalPostprandialBloodSuger,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
criticalWeight = #{criticalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tableId = #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update details set caseId = #{caseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baseDetailsId = #{basedetailsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, otherDetailsId = #{otherdetailsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, criticalBloodPressureHeigh = #{criticalBloodPressureHeigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, criticalBloodPressureLow = #{criticalBloodPressureLow,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, criticalFastingBloodSuger = #{criticalFastingBloodSuger,jdbcType=DOUBLE}), criticalPostprandialBloodSuger = #{criticalPostprandialBloodSuger,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, criticalWeight = #{criticalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}), delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tableId = #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
